ranks.text: This cooperation can be picked up from 5/6 onwards, but is entirely optional and easy to miss for months. Yoshida can be found in Station Square, but if you listen to his political preaching you'll learn that he frequents a nearby Beef Bowl Shop.You can apply to work there via the leaflets in the train station. Work there twice and you'll meet Yoshida, starting off this confidant cooperation.
Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:Unlocks Diplomacy, a useful ability that lets you get more money or items from demon negotiation.
choices: Choice 1: "I want to improve my speech." +2
Choice 2: "One with conviction." +2 / "I don't know yet." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Fundraising, which allows you to demand a lot more money during demon negotiation.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Manipulation, a skill that raises the chance enemies will give up rare items.
choices: Choice 1: "That media doesn't matter." +3 / "I think so." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "I don't really care." +3 / "I'm for them." +2
Choice 2: "I'd decline." +3 / "I'd leave it to chance." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Mind Control, an ability that sometimes lets you skip demon negotiation entirely.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 2: "You had a change of heart." +2

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank.Unlocks Charismatic Speech, allowing for contracts to be forged with higher-level Persona more easily.
